items.summary: Extend the Motoko backend `Mood` variant type in `backend/main.mo` to include these 12 new moods so the generated frontend `Mood` enum stays in sync: `#thirsty`, `#dehydrated`, `#sleepy`, `#wired`, `#sore`, `#bloated`, `#overheated`, `#cold`, `#headache`, `#nauseous`, `#lightheaded`, `#restless`. Also extend `module Mood.toText` to return the corresponding English labels (including the exact label text "Wired (too much caffeine)" for `#wired`).

Update the frontend mood catalog in `frontend/src/constants/moods.ts` to add the 12 new moods under the existing `physical-state` category with matching emojis, so they appear everywhere the mood picker is used (Daily Check-In and Compose flows). Use these exact label+emoji pairs:
